name: elasticsearch-practice
description: [Practice](https://www.lullabot.com/articles/a-nodejs-client-for-elasticsearch) about A Node.js Client for Elasticsearch

scripts.lint: node_modules/.bin/eslint -c .eslintrc.json --env node --ignore-pattern public/js *.js && node_modules/.bin/eslint -c .eslintrc.json --env browser public/js
scripts.lint:fix: node_modules/.bin/eslint -c .eslintrc.json --env node --fix --ignore-pattern public/js *.js && node_modules/.bin/eslint -c .eslintrc.json --env browser --fix public/js/
